name: Jaipur
tagline: The Pink City of royal heritage
description: Jaipur is known for its forts, palaces, vibrant bazaars, and rich royal history.
facts: Jaipur is part of the Golden Triangle tourist circuit.
It was one of the first planned cities of India.

name: Varanasi
description: Varanasi is one of the oldest living cities in the world, famous for its ghats and temples.
facts: Situated on the banks of the river Ganga.
Important center for Hindu philosophy and music.
